body: @wangwangwangBoy Can you provide a demo application? I need to reproduce this exception.

> @wangwangwangBoy Can you provide a demo application? I need to reproduce this exception.

That's our project code. It may take a while to make a demo. I will upload a demo later. I avoided this problem by canceling the security check, but found a new problem. When inserting data into a data table that is not configured with a table-sharing strategy, this error 'Cannot find strategy for generate keys.' occurred. After debugging, I found that the key generation strategy only has two tables I configured. How can I solve it?
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/46279672/135007370-21bc5a98-989c-4a84-81b5-8bfc3f603d81.png)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/46279672/135007808-afa9c8cb-7efb-4f88-b20e-2e11abbd336c.png)
@justbk2015 feedback it works. Closed.

> configured

@wangwangwangBoy `Cannot find strategy for generate keys.` is a known bug and has been fixed in the master branch. You can test it.

> > configured
> 
> @wangwangwangBoy `Cannot find strategy for generate keys.` is a known bug and has been fixed in the master branch. You can test it.

Can you give me a compressed package of master's pom jar? The latest Sharding version used by our company is 4.1, and there is no master jar, just like the picture
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/46279672/135009901-a8bb611f-a46b-46c0-839a-4d61a6a96188.png)

The complete compressed package is large, and the version will be updated continuously. 
It is recommended that users build by themselves so that the latest version can be obtained at any time.
Here is a build guide:
https://github.com/apache/shardingsphere/blob/master/README_ZH.md
Thank you. Let me try.

Hi @SpriderMan , could you try with version 5.0? I tested with MySQL, it works. You could follow [Scaling Usage](https://shardingsphere.apache.org/document/current/cn/user-manual/shardingsphere-scaling/usage/ )
Hi @SpriderMan , thanks for your feedback. We'll output detailed logs for better troubleshooting.
Hi @wl4g , scaling is not for data synchronization currently.
@852814453 For English only, I will close this issue now, please create a new issue with English.

> @marker-wu
> Just put multiple config files in Proxy, like the [example](https://github.com/apache/shardingsphere/tree/master/examples/shardingsphere-proxy-example/shardingsphere-proxy-hint-example/src/main/resources).

Haha, I began to think that all sharding configurations can only be configured in config-sharding.yaml, it's my mistake
Does sharding-proxy load all yaml files in the conf directory? There is no restriction on file name, right?

> Does sharding-proxy load all yaml files in the conf directory? There is no restriction on file name, right?

Yes, there is no limit. A normal file name is fine.
There are a lot of files affected by this PR, and I have started to review.
It has been communicated and verified, it is an environmental issue, not a bug.
